fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Hack a player at night, scrambling their action.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Their target becomes randomized. You learn the new target.
- Their feedback is randomized, if they would've gotten it. You learn the original feedback.
- The words of their ability are moved around at random, but in a way that they still make sense. You don't learn this one.
